original_text: Some of them had charge of the utensils of service, for they were required to count them when they were brought in and taken out.
korean_text: 그 중에 어떤 자는 섬기는 데 쓰는 기구를 맡아서 그 수효대로 들여가고 수효대로 내오며

sentences.original_text: Some of them had charge of the utensils of service
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 어떤 이들은 봉사에 쓰는 기구들을 맡았으니

sentences.original_text: for they were required to count them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것들을 계수해야 할 의무가 있었으니

sentences.original_text: when they were brought in and taken out.
